alert.note: Alert for Carter; Johnston; Marshall (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 2:30AM CST until November 20 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Johnston County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Northern Marshall County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CST. * At 230 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mannsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Madill, Tishomingo, Dickson, Mannsville, Ravia, Wapanucka, Milburn, Fillmore, Russett, Coleman, Nida, northeastern Lake Texoma, and Oakland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
